keywords: convenience@serve with salad for complete meal
subtitle: Tasty frozen chunky potato wedges cooked with chicken and bacon - making an ideal mid-week meal.

method.text: Preheat oven to 200°C. Arrange the potato wedges in a large, shallow ovenproof dish or roasting tray.
Wrap each piece of chicken in a halved bacon rasher. Add to the dish with the wedges.
Toss the onion in the oil. Then place in the dish with the wedges and chicken. Season.
Cook in the oven for 25 min or until the chicken is cooked and the wedges are golden brown and crispy.

title: Weekday potato wedges with bacon wrapped chicken
